properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; New York Harbor; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 7:33PM EST until February 8 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts
up to 45 kt and seas 11 to 16 feet. For the Small Craft
Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 7 to 10 feet expected.

* WHERE...The Long Island Sound, New York Harbor, Peconic and
Gardiners Bays, Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20
nm, South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay,
Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm, and Fire
Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 7 AM EST Saturday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, from 7 AM to 1 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY
